reuters.title: U.S. INTERVENED TO BUY 50 MLN DLRS AGAINST YEN ON JANUARY 28, FED SAYS
reuters.body: A group of affiliated investment firms led by Bermuda-based Fidelity International Ltd and Boston-based FMR Corp, told the Securities and Exchange Commission it raised its stake in McGill Manufacturing Co Inc. The group said it raised its stake to 88,580 shares, or 6.2 pct of the total outstanding common stock, after buying 14,135 McGill common shares between Jan 19 and March 2 at prices ranging from 33.57 to 34.57 dlrs a share. Reuter 
